entries.bdg_accolade_home_show: ...winner of the Galactic Home Show and recognized as being an exceptional interior designer.

entries.bdg_corvette_reb_rescue: ...has been recognized by the Alliance as an elite soldier for work in rescuing imprisoned comrades aboard a captured Rebel Blockade Runner.
entries.bdg_corvette_reb_destroy: ...has been recognized by the Alliance as an elite soldier for work in destroying a captured Rebel Blockade Runner.
entries.bdg_corvette_reb_assassin: ...has been recognized by the Alliance as an elite soldier for work in eliminating key Imperial personnel on a captured Rebel Blockade Runner.
entries.bdg_corvette_neutral_rescue: ...has been recognized by the Hutt clan for work in freeing our imprisoned friends aboard a Corellian Corvette.
entries.bdg_corvette_neutral_destroy: ...has been recognized by the Hutt clan for work in destroying Corellian Corvette.
entries.bdg_corvette_neutral_assassin: ...has been recognized by the Hutt clan for work in eliminating key personnel at the Hutt's request.
entries.bdg_corvette_imp_rescue: ...has been recognized for bravery in the face of danger, for rescuing Imperial Loyalists from the Rebel Menace, imprisoned on a Rebel Blockade Runner.
entries.bdg_corvette_imp_destroy: ...has been recognized as an Elite Imperial Soldier, for bravery in the call of duty, eliminating a Rebel Blockade Runner.
entries.bdg_corvette_imp_assassin: ...has been recognized as an elite Imperial soldier for work in eliminating key Rebel personnel aboard a fully functional Rebel Blockade Runner.
entries.acc_professional_demeanor: ...has been recognized as being a tribute to their profession.
entries.acc_interesting_personage: ...has been recognized as having a memorable personality.
entries.acc_good_samaritan: ...has been recognized as an exceptional guide to those seeking knowledge.
entries.acc_fascinating_background: ...has been recognized as having an exceptional biography.
entries.acc_brave_soldier: ...has been recognized as an exceptional soldier in the war.
